body_html: I have the same issue (with cuda 9.1 + tensorflow 1.5). I think to resolve it, one option is that to downgrade cuda to 9.0. The other option would be to downgrade both cuda to 8.0 and tensorflow to 1.4. If you have already installed cuda 8.0, you only need to modify LD_LIBRARY_PATH (and CUDA_HOME) environment variable to point to cuda 8.0 directory (i.e. /usr/local/cuda-8.0).
